Package com.dhemery.polling

Evaluate conditions repeatedly.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Poller Repeatedly evaluate a condition until the condition is satisfied.
Ticker Marks time in fixed-size intervals called "ticks" and expires at some instant after starting.
 

Class Summary
ComposedPoller A poller composed of objects that perform the specified actions before polling, between polls, on poll failure, and to determine whether to continue polling when the condition is not satisfied.
ParameterizedPoller A poller that performs the specified actions before polling, between polls, on poll failure, and to determine whether to continue polling when the condition is not satisfied.
SystemClockTicker An ticker that uses the system clock to reckon time.
TickingPoller A poller that uses a ticker to delay between polls, and throws a PollTimeoutException if the ticker expires before the condition is satisfied.
 

Exception Summary
PollTimeoutException Indicates that a poll's ticker expired before the polled condition was satisfied.
 

Package com.dhemery.polling Description

Evaluate conditions repeatedly.
